org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl

Class GblUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl.GblUtils

  • public class GblUtils
extends Object
    A class with only static utilities related to GBL

      • getSimplePerToClPrj

        static Hep3Matrix getSimplePerToClPrj(double tanLambda)
        Computes the projection matrix from perigee to curvilinear frame, with reference point(0,0,0) for the perigee frame. The projection matrix only depends on tanLambda.
        Parameters:
        tanLambda -
        Returns:
        3x3 projection matrix

      • getPerToClPrj

        static Hep3Matrix getPerToClPrj(HelicalTrackFit htf)
        Computes the projection matrix from the perigee XY plane variables dca and z0 into the curvilinear xT,yT,zT frame (U,V,T) with reference point (0,0,0) for the perigee frame.
        Parameters:
        htf - input helix to find the track direction
        Returns:
        3x3 projection matrix
